The following options are configurable in theme.scss:

    $page-link-color
        Type: color
        Color to use for links in the nav bar.
        
    $page-link-color-hover
        Type: color
        Color to use for links in the nav bar when hovered over.
        
    $background-primary
        Type: color
        Color to use for the background.
        
    $text-color
        Type: color
        Color to use for text
